title: How to Get Free Fruits in Blox Fruits from Events, Players, & More

steps.title: Get free fruit from seasonal events.
steps.content: Get free fruit from seasonal events. Blox Fruits has a number of seasonal events, and you can get free fruits from some of these events. The only downside is that you have to wait for that event to happen again, which is only once per year. These events are as follows: Christmas: Held in December. During the Christmas Event, players can get Holiday Gifts from the North Pole island (a temporary island added to each sea during the event). [1] X Research source Holiday Gifts can give out Uncommon, Rare, Legendary, and Mythical fruits. [2] X Research source Halloween: Held in October. During the Halloween Event, you can exchange Bones with the Death King for a number of rewards, including a "Random Surprise." [3] X Research source If you pick Random Surprise, there's an 8% chance you'll get a random Blox Fruit. Bones can be obtained year-round by killing certain NPCs, but you can only exchange them for a surprise during Halloween. Valentine's Day: Held in February. During the Valentine's event, you can exchange Hearts for Blox Fruits at the Event Shop. Hearts are earned when you defeat an enemy that is either 100 levels higher or 100 levels lower than your level. The cost of an item (in Hearts) depends on the rarity of said item. For example, Rocket cost 50 Hearts while Control costs 3,200 Hearts. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Get fruits from another player.
steps.content: Get fruits from another player. Sometimes, you can find other players who are giving away Blox Fruits. This could be for a variety of reasons, including players that are quitting the game or players who just want to be generous. A good place to look for other players that are giving away Blox Fruits is in the Café in Second Sea, or the Turtle Mansion in Third Sea. Another way to get free Blox Fruits from another player is to get them from YouTube giveaways. Check out your favorite Blox Fruits creators on YouTube to find any current giveaways happening at the moment.

steps.title: Purchase fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer.
steps.content: Purchase fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. While this technically isn't free , it doesn't require any actual money to buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. While you can use Robux to buy Blox Fruits permanently, you can also use in-game currency known as Beli (also sometimes just called money), which uses the USD money symbol ($). Fruits at the Blox Fruit Dealer range in price from just $5,000 to $15,000,000. You can view the Blox Fruit Dealer's current stock on the "Stock" Blox Fruits Wiki . The Blox Fruits Dealer can be found on the Pirate Starter Island, Marine Starter Island, Middle Town, Kingdom of Rose (Docks 1), the Cafe, the Mansion, and Port Town. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Hacks and glitches to get fruits exist, but it's best to avoid them.
steps.content: Hacks and glitches to get fruits exist, but it's best to avoid them. Using hacks and glitches to get free fruits illegitimately is against Blox Fruits's rules, so you could get in trouble if you're caught. These hacks and glitches are also often fixed or blocked, so they aren't a reliable way to get fruits. If a hack states that you need to send money or download something to make it work, avoid it—it's more than likely a scam. Many videos promising to show glitches of how to get free Blox Fruits don't actually show how to complete the glitch. These videos instruct players to take a lot of steps to do the glitch, which is more than likely a way to make the video long enough for monetization and also to increase viewer retention time.
